name: Robert Jankowski
text: Hungry Howies is one of the best around. I love this one

name: Thelma Farr
text: Amazing pizza and friendly staff. Highly recommend coming here

name: John Keen
text: They delivered to us for years. The new manager said they stopped delivering to our area a year ago. They have been delivering us pizzas once or twice a week all year. Find a new manager! What a joke..............

name: Chris Paschen
text: Fresh hot pizza, fast and friendly service

name: Shannon Belloli
text: Excellent stuffed Howie bread and and BIG salad. All employees wore a mask and were friendly even though they were busy

name: Xavier Matos
text: This was my first time eating here & i loved it. I ordered the Asian pizza & loved the way it tasted. The inside was clean & the staff were professional & kind. I would definitely eat here again if given the chance as well as recommend to family & friends.

name: Esteven Arambula
text: Chicken bacon ranch pizza is yummy

name: julianna gawne
text: Every time I order from them they get at least one sandwich wrong, this time they got all three wrong...when I called to order, the manager Katie answered and kept cutting me off, rushed the order and put the toppings we wanted on the ‚Ä¶More

name: Brandon Bosnak
text: Trash I order my food a hour ago said 30-45 min I called was out on hold for 20 min hung up called back hold again another 15 min. Just to say it's on way lmao place is a joke we will see if I even get my food.

name: Melody Wentworth
text: First the customer service was good! The food quality was not. Burned sub with the sloppiest ingredients.two chunks of lettuce not leaves or slices, literal chunks. Sam with tomatoes - 4 chunks. Just a mess. Not the usual quality.

name: Michelle Kruzell
text: They've made quite a few mistakes but food is still good

name: Tkayu 15
text: Wouldnt deliver a whole mile outside of their "delivery range " for a whole $30 tip..ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

name: Killer Miller
text: An absolute joke have delivered to my house since I've lived here and now won't come 2 more block to deliver a pizza will never have my business ever again!

name: Pati M
text: Fast service, pizza was loaded with ham and pineapple and their new Smokey Bacon is to die for. The manager is great also. No tip jar out front but I still tipped. Please tip the workers that make your pizza,s when you go in for carry out.

name: Bryan Worden
text: Food was good. I miss the buffet. I wanted water to drink they gave me a cup and i had to go to the restroom to get water.

name: Jessica Lewis
text: They forgot to cut our pizzas, so we had to try it ourselves at home... Which didn't work out too well lol. Also the cheese and sauce was sliding off everywhere. It was okay for one slice a person around the bonfire but if we had been sober ‚Ä¶More

name: Kathy Wyrybkowski
text: The pizza was fantastic.  But they billed me twice on mine credit card.  I have called to talk to someone to put the money back or just give me the money.  This happen on Friday and I still haven't received the money.  12.71 was the charge ‚Ä¶More

name: Erica Breece
text: Love their pizza but miss the thin crust being cut in squaresüòî I order online and always request the square cut. Usually get it but today my request was not honored therefore looked past on the ticket.

name: Julie Miller
text: We tried your pizza for the first time.  Love it!  To bad  it's not closer to our home!  My grandson said  I want to bury u dinner.  I was hesatant but agreed.  Great  stuff.  Looks like I'm going to  revisit.  Thanks Julie  Miller

name: D.R. sherm
text: Friendly service!

name: Carolyn M
text: Pizza taste very good but crazy bread is tooooo much butter yucky. I ordered Italian regular oven-baked sub I asked for lettuce and tomato they put few like two I called explain somehow a manager ignores won‚Äôt do anything!! Rip off!

name: Laugh Out Loud
text: The food is great, and delivery is rather prompt. The staff is always helpful.  However, nobody wants the core pieces of iceburg lettuce in thier salads.

name: Keith Willett
text: Good food. Service a little slow do to the fact they could use some extra help. 3 people working and busting their butt to fill orders. Crew did a good job.

name: Phone Enthusiast
text: Great pizza! I will come back to this place very soon to order a Magical Lunch!

name: Jessica Manley
text: Worst experience ever.  Pop was warm...no ice...no cups... manager was supposedly going to buy cups left after our order was taken but never returned with cups.  Our pizza came out we ate it without drinks.  We asked about switching from a ‚Ä¶More

name: Kathi Gyuran
text: I Didn't care for the thickness of the cheese and the crust was doughy...the service was fine.. good place to eat if you like a lot of cheese ... Not sure what was wrong with the crust...

name: Casey Corlew
text: This is one of my favorite pizza places. They are open late and have good priced pizza. It's always done quick and right for my wife and I. Flavored crust is amazing, I always go for the garlic but I'm sure they are all good.

name: Grace Lynch
text: Lexie is so nice and pretty. She is the best pizza maker in the world. She deserves a raise !!!!

name: Don Roberts
text: I give them a 5

name: David Popps
text: Its chain pizza! The manager was very friendly and our order was cooked perfect.  The store was very clean, unfortunately they dont have the buffet anymore but still have seating that im sure you could order up your food and eat it inside but thats just a guess?

name: Samantha lykouretzos
text: We went for vacation to see a friend and we have never tried Hungry Howies ever food was pretty good. The service was great yo very friendly. Took our order to the picnic table outside which is a nice area yo have would totally eat there again when we visit Gladwin!!!

name: Art Whelan
text: Good food for a good proce!

name: Margo Payne
text: We like the pizza

name: 10 cent gamer
text: Great pizza at good prices.  But its all the varieties of flavors you can add to your crust that makes howies special

name: Edward Wright
text: Good pizza and service. I do love the deep dish cheese bread. Their calzones are really sandwiches made out of pizza dough. They are good as well

name: Brad Smart
text: AWESOME PIZZA!!! besides a lil mom & pops store I know, by far the best pizza I've had. Especially for a pizza chain. I recommend to anyone, Eat there!

text: Our pizza is better, step up your game Howie #NoOneOutPizzasTheHut

name: Austin
text: Great service, fun staff, cheap food

name: Brian Gaughan
text: I would do no stars if I could the pizza was overly greasy I could see through the stuff crust it‚Äôs like a piece of cheese was melted out of it wish I would‚Äôve just went to Pizza Hut,the delivery driver Look like he needed a bath not impressed at all

name: Kolby Bell
text: They never give me the sauce I order and pay for. This most recent time I noticed when I was leaving they didn't give me bbq sauce, but didn't notice until I got back they forgot the two sub sauce. This always happens, if you order out make sure to check for your sauce.

text: Retried after they fired the old manager and it is phenomenal!!!! Excellent food. Great employees.
